++ House Rulings

++++Teleportation Circle:
By the book, it takes 365 days to make a Teleportation Circle. This ~magic item~ would be worth 9125 gold when crafted at 25g per day.
Rulings:
-is now only worth 5000g (200 days)
-others with magical aptitude can help create it (at least one person needs the spell memorized)
-gems, or similar magic items can be consumed to accelerate the process respective to the item's value.



Common		50-100 gp
Uncommon	101-500 gp
Rare     	501 -5,000 gp
Very rare	5,001 - 50,000 gp
Legendary	50,001+ gp
